tag_list: design-leadership, mobile, user-experience-design, strategy, interaction-design, design-research, product-development, management, social-media, design-methods, international-experience, global-deployment
overview:
UX design leader with 15 years of in-depth experience in directing and designing best-in-class digital services across multiple touch points (mobile, web and smart objects), with 8 years in development and deployment of complex, large scale software.

Key player in projects with global brands in experience planning, creative direction, design process, cross-discipline leadership (research, interaction and visual design) and sell through of ideas within organizations.

Strategic thinker and effect leader who is absolutely passionate about design2build - bringing ground-breaking digital solutions that solve real life problems into people’s hands.
